analytic.title: The Death of King Dhū Nuwās (ca 517-525 CE) in the Himyarite Inscriptions, Syriac, Greek and Arabic Sources: His Military and Religious Policy

monogr.title: Interrelations between the Peoples of the Near East and Byzantium in Pre-Islamic Times

body.bibl: Abuljadayl, Aisha. “The Death of King Dhū Nuwās (ca 517-525 CE) in the Himyarite Inscriptions, Syriac, Greek and Arabic Sources: His Military and Religious Policy.” In Interrelations between the Peoples of the Near East and Byzantium in Pre-Islamic Times, edited by Vassilios Christides, 11–23. Semitica Antiqua 3. Córdoba: CNERU / DTR / Oriens Academic, 2015.
